data.title: FILMS (from film festivals, art houses)= ALPHABETICAL LISTING & RATING@Arts & Opinion
meta_keywords: Alphabetical listing and rating of films
data.meta_description: Arts & Opinion, editor Robert J. Lewis, a Montreal-based e-zine exploring contemporary issues, soliciting new material, publishes fiction, non-fiction, poetry, and reviews of film, music, art, exhibitions, theater.
